cripple.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to hurt someone badly so that they cannot walk properly
cripple.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: She was crippled in a car accident.
cripple.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to damage something badly so that it no longer works or is no longer effective
cripple.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Industry is being crippled by high interest rates.
cripple.translation[1].definitions[0].de: someone who is unable to walk properly because their legs are damaged or injured, now considered offensive
